pitch.cc: Mitch Talbot has thrown 89 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 91 over the past 10 pitches.
Mitch Talbot really has his changeup working; he's allowing a .127 average against it this season and White Sox hitters are 0-for-4 against it in this game.
